value: Spell that creates a five foot acid bubble within fifty feet. It explodes, causing acid damage.
title: Acid Splash

value: Spell that increases the health and maximum health of up to 3 different creatures.
title: Aid

value: Spell that creates a magical alarm that alerts the caster that there is an intrusion in a twenty foot area.
title: Alarm

value: Spell that changes the caster to be able to breath underwater, change their appearance, or grow natural weapons like claws or fangs.
title: Alter Self

value: Spell that compels a beast to see that you mean no harm to it. The spell is ended if the beast is harmed.
title: Animal Friendship

value: Spell that allows the caster to choose a tiny beast that will travel and communicate a simple message to a person of their choosing.
title: Animal Messenger

value: Spell that transforms any willing creatures into beasts of the caster's choosing.
title: Animal Shapes

value: Spell that tranforms a dead corpse or pile of bones into an undead creature. This could be a zombie or skeleton, respectively.
title: Animate Dead

value: Spell that transforms an inanimate object into a living creature that follows your commands.
title: Animate Objects

value: Spell that prevents living creatures from entering a 10 foot sphere emanating from the caster. It has no affect on constructs or undead.
title: Antilife Shell

value: Spell that creates a ten foot antimagic emanation from the caster which prevents magic effects from working inside it.
title: Antimagic Field

value: Spell that causes a creature to be frightened. It must move as far away from the caster as possible.
title: Antipathy

value: Spell that causes a creature to be frightened must move as far away from the caster as possible or to be charmed and must move as close as possible to the caster.
title: Antipathy/Sympathy

value: Spell creates an invisible eye which allows the caster to see from that eye in every direction. The eye can be moved.
title: Arcane Eye

value: Spell creates two connecting portals. One within ten feet and the other up to five hundred feet within visual range. Misty glowing rings floating above ground.
title: Arcane Gate

value: Spell creates a magic lock that cannot be lockpicked or opened in any nonmagical way.
title: Arcane Lock

value: Spell allows the caster to heal a minor amount of health.
title: Arcane Vigor

value: Spell creates magical frost armor for the caster. Any melee attackers will take cold damage.
title: Armor of Agathys

value: Spell creates tendrils emanating from the caster up to ten feet in length. Each tendril causes necrotic damage.
title: Arms of Hadar

value: Spell projects the caster and other companions to the astral plane. Their real bodies are in a state of suspended animation.
title: Astral Projection

value: Spell allows caster to receive an omen from an otherworldly entity about an action you are about to take within thirty minutes.
title: Augury

value: Spell creates a thirty foot emanation that gives resistance to necrotic damage.
title: Aura of Life

value: Spell creates a thirty foot emanation that gives resistance to poison damage.
title: Aura of Purity

value: Spell creates a thirty foot emanation that heals an ally for a minor amount repeatedly for a period of time.
title: Aura of Vitality

value: Spell that can be casted on a beast or a plant which gives it intelligence enough to speak and move. The target is charmed towards the caster.
title: Awaken

value: Spell that causes the target to miss their attacks more often.
title: Bane

value: Spell that causes an attack to cause extra force damage. A sufficiently damaged target is sent to a demiplane where they are incapacitated for a time.
title: Banishing Smite

value: Spell that causes the target to be transported to a demiplane where they are incapacitated for a time.
title: Banishment

value: Spell that causes the target's skin to transform into a barklike appearance. This increases their ability to prevent damage.
title: Barkskin

value: Spell that causes any number of targets in range to be wiser and more resiliant when fallen in battle.
title: Beacon of Hope

value: Spell that allows you to see through eyes of a beast you can touch and use any senses it has.
title: Beast Sense

value: Spell that causes the target is unable to cast spells and takes incredible psychic damage.
title: Befuddlement

value: Spell when target is touched, it is cursed with disadvantage in one ability.
title: Bestow Curse

value: Spell that creates a magical hand that moves and attacks at your will. It is able to grab, push, punch, and provide cover.
title: Bigby's Hand

value: Spell that creates a wall of whirling blades that damage opponents that enter its space.
title: Blade Barrier

value: Spell that causes attackers to have difficulty targeting the caster.
title: Blade Ward

value: Spell that causes up to three targets have better ability to target enemies and resist the enemies' effects.
title: Bless

value: Spell that causes the target to take necrotic damage. Nonmagical plant targets instantly wither and die.
title: Blight

value: Spell that causes radiant damage and blinds the target.
title: Blinding Smite

value: Spell that blinds the target.
title: Blindness

value: Spell that blinds or deafens the target.
title: Blindness/Deafness

value: Spell with a chance to cause the caster to enter the ethereal plane at the end of their turn, preventing them from being targeted by attacks.
title: Blink

value: Spell that causes you to appear blurred to others. This helps prevent the caster from being targeted by attacks.
title: Blur

value: Spell that causes flames to shoot from your hands causing damage in a cone in front of the caster.
title: Burning Hands

value: Spell that causes a lighting bolt to strike within a 60 foot radius once at the end of every turn.
title: Call Lightning

value: Spell that causes the target to no longer be hostile towards creatures of the caster's choosing.
title: Calm Emotions

value: Spell that shoots a lightning bolt that travels from one target to another in close range.
title: Chain Lightning

value: Spell that causes any sort of creature to be friendly to you.
title: Charm Monster

value: Spell to enchant a humanoid within range to consider the caster as a friend for a time or until it is injured. After the spell ends, the target will know that it was charmed.
title: Charm Person

value: Spell casted when the caster takes a melee attack against a target. It causes necrotic damage.
title: Chill Touch

value: Spell that launches a magical orb of acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder damage at a target. It has a chance to leap to other targets in close range.
title: Chromatic Orb

value: Spell that causes necrotic damage in a sixty foot radius.
title: Circle of Death

value: Spell that causes allies to have advantage on all magical effects while within range.
title: Circle of Power

value: Spell that creates an invisible sensor in a space. The target is able to see or hear through that sensor as if they were there.
title: Clairvoyance

value: Spell that creates a duplicate of another creature. It is grown in an expensive vessel and takes a long time to produce. If the target ever dies, their soul is transferred to the clone.
title: Clone

value: Spell that creates a sphere of yellowish green fog that causes poison damage. It moves away from the caster by 10 feet per turn.
title: Cloudkill

value: Spell that creates a cloud of spinning daggers that causes slashing damage to any creatures that enter the space.
title: Cloud of Daggers

value: Spell that creates a magical display of lights in a cone in front of the caster. It may blind enemies.
title: Color Spray

value: Spell that causes the target to either approach, drop what they're holding, flee, grovel, or halt immediately.
title: Command

value: Spell that allows the caster to speak to a divine entity to ask up to three questions.
title: Commune

value: Spell that allows the caster to speak with the nature spirits to gain knowledge. Reveals locations, portals, prevalent plants beasts, bodies of water, and celestial, elemental, fey, fiend, or undead.
title: Commune with Nature

value: Spell that causes enemy to target the caster specifically. It has disadvantage targeting anything else.
title: Compelled Duel

value: Spell that allows the caster to understand any language seen or heard. The caster must be touching the surface of a written word to understand it. It does not decode cipher.
title: Comprehend Languages

value: Spell that charms a target, allowing the caster to compel them to move safely left or right.
title: Compulsion

value: Spell that causes cold damage in a cone in front of the caster.
title: Cone of Cold

value: Spell that causes enemies in a ten foot area to do random things such as move in a random direction, stand still, or attack a random creature.
title: Confusion

value: Spell that creates an intangible pack of animals. Whenever an enemy enters this area they take slashing damage.
title: Conjure Animals

value: Spell that creates spectral weapons or ammunition that assaults creatures in a 60 foot cone with force damage.
title: Conjure Barrage

value: Spell that summons a celestial that appears as a pillar of light. It can heal allies or sear enemies with radiant damage.
title: Conjure Celestial

value: Spell that summons an elemental spirit. An enemy entering its space takes specific damage of lightning, thunder, fire, or water and is restrained.
title: Conjure Elemental

value: Spell that summons a fey spirit. It can attack causing the target to take psychic damage and become frightened. It can teleport and attack another target.
title: Conjure Fey

value: Spell that summons elemental spirits that surround the caster in a range of fifteen feet. They cause acid, cold, fire, or lightning damage to enemies in this area.
title: Conjure Minor Elementals

value: Spell that creates spectral weapons or ammunition in a volley that causes force damage.
title: Conjure Volley

value: Spell that summons nature spirits in a ten foot range that causes force damage as enemies enter the area.
title: Conjure Woodland Beings

value: Spell that allows the caster to speak to a demigod, long-dead sage, or an entity from another plane to ask five yes or no questions but at the risk of recieving psychic damage.
title: Contact Other Plane

value: Spell that inflicts necrotic damage when the caster touches an enemy. The enemy is poisoned and is at a disadvantage.
title: Contagion

value: Spell that triggers another spell when certain conditions are met.
title: Contingency

value: Spell that ignites a flame from an object. That object then casts light. The flame consumes no fuel, creates no heat, and can't be smothered.
title: Continual Flame

value: Spell that allows the caster to control water allowing it to create a flood, part a path through the water, redirect the flow, or create a whirlpool.
title: Control Water

value: Spell that allows the caster to change the weather, create clouds, fog, rain, hail, snow, or blizzard. The caster must be outdoors and it takes time to affect the climate.
title: Control Weather

value: Spell that plants four arrows or bolts into the ground. As an enemy enters in a range of thirty feet, the arrow flies up and strikes it.
title: Cordon of Arrows

value: Spell that attempts to interrupt a spell casted by an opponent.
title: Counterspell

value: Spell that creates either 45 pounds of food or ten gallons of clean water.
title: Enlarge

value: Spell that creates 45 pounds of food. It is bland and spoils after 24 hours if uneaten.
title: Create Food

value: Spell that creates up to ten gallons of clean water in a container or by raining down in an area.
title: Create or Destroy Water

value: Spell that can only be cast at night. The caster can transform up to three corpses into ghouls that they control that follow their orders. It takes time to cast this completely.
title: Create Undead

value: Spell that summons shadow material and creates a small object made out of vegetable or mineral matter like a rope or key. It dissapates into shadow when the spell ends.
title: Creation

value: Spell that charms a creature. It must attack a creature of the caster's choosing each turn before it can move away.
title: Crown of Madness

value: Spell that creates a thirty foot magical emanation that causes the caster and their allies to cause additional radiant damage with their attacks.
title: Crusader's Mantle

value: Spell that heals a creature the caster can touch.
title: Cure Wounds

value: Spell that creates four dancing lights that can be moved by the caster.
title: Dancing Lights

value: Spell that creates a darkness emanation from a point or an object that can't be seen through and light cannot penetrate.
title: Darkness

value: Spell that grants the target the ability to see in dim light for up to 150 feet.
title: Darkvision

value: Spell that creates bright light at a point or to emanate from an object.
title: Daylight

value: Spell that grants the target protection from death. At the moment where damage would bring it completely to death, the target would instead have a single sliver of health.
title: Death Ward

value: Spell that deafens the target.
title: Deafness

value: Spell that creates a glowing bead that eventually explodes with the force of a powerful fireball when it is dispelled.
title: Delayed Blast Fireball

value: Spell that creates a magical doorway that leads to a demiplane where items and creatures can be stored.
title: Demiplane

value: Spell that destroys fog or up to ten gallons of water.
title: Create or Destroy Water

value: Spell that causes necrotic or thunderous damage in a wave.
title: Destructive Wave

value: Spell that allows the caster to sense celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, or undead and their location.
title: Detect Evil and Good

value: Spell that reveals if there are magical effects around the caster in a thirty foot range.
title: Detect Magic

value: Spell that detects if there are poisons or disease in the local area.
title: Detect Poison and Disease

value: Spell that allows the caster to sense creatures that have thoughts and allows the caster to read the thoughts of a single individual.
title: Detect Thoughts

value: Spell that teleports the caster and one other willing target to a location in range.
title: Dimension Door

value: Spell that causes the caster to appear to look like somebody else.
title: Disguise Self

value: Spell that launches a green ray that causes incredible damage. If the attack kills, the target is distigrated into gray dust.
title: Disintegrate

value: Spell that breaks charmed and frightened enchantments. Celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and the undead can be dismissed back to their home planes.
title: Dispel Evil and Good

value: Spell that dispels a magical effect within 120 feet.
title: Dispel Magic

value: Spell that causes the target to hear a melody in their mind which causes psychic damage.
title: Dissonant Whispers

value: Spell that allows the caster to ask a question of a god or god's servant.
title: Divination

value: Spell that calls on divinity and gives the caster divine radiance. Subsequent attacks will cause radiant damage.
title: Divine Favor

value: Spell that adds radiant damage to an attack.
title: Divine Smite

value: Spell that causes a random effect including the death of the target and blindness, deafness, stunned conditions
title: Divine Word

value: Spell that has a chance of controlling a beast and commanding it to do the caster's will.
title: Dominate Beast

value: Spell that has a chance of controlling a creature and commanding it to do the caster's will.
title: Dominate Monster

value: Spell that has a chance of controlling a humonoid and commanding it to do the caster's will.
title: Dominate Person

value: Spell that grants the target that the caster can touch the ability to breathe fire.
title: Dragon's Breath

value: Spell that consumes an expensive saphire that will summon a marked object to the caster's hand.
title: Drawmij's Instant Summons

value: Spell that causes the target and a designated dream messenger to enter a trance. They can enter the dreams of a target or make it a nightmare that causes psychic damage.
title: Dream

value: Spell that allows the caster to predict the weather, make plants bloom, or create a harmless sensory effect like a puff of wind or the smell of a dead animal.
title: Druidcraft

value: Spell that creates tremors and rips the ground apart. It topples structures and creates fissures where creatures can fall in.
title: Earthquake

value: Spell that casts a beam of pure energy at a creature, causing magical force damage.
title: Eldritch Blast

value: Spell that creates an elemental effect such as a breeze, dust, embers, mist. It can also shape elements into a figure that fits in a one foot cube.
title: Elementalism

value: Spell that causes a weapon touched by the caster to cause magical damage: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder.
title: Elemental Weapon

value: Spell that causes the target to have increased ability with Strength, Dexterity, Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma.
title: Enhance Ability

value: Spell that increases the size of the target making them harder to move and increases their damage.
title: Enlarge

value: Spell that increases or decreases the size of the target which affects how easy they are to move and the damage they output.
title: Enlarge/Reduce

value: Spell that creates grasping vines around the target when it is hit with an attack that restrains the target.
title: Ensnaring Strike

value: Spell that creates grasping plants on the ground. They are hard to traverse and any targets in the area are restrained.
title: Entangle

value: Spell that implements a distracting string of words. They cause targets unable to perceive things well.
title: Enthrall

value: Spell that causes the caster to enter the Ethereal Plane. The caster can move in any direction. When the spell is ended, they are brought back in their new location.
title: Etherealness

value: Spell that creates squirming tentacles in a twenty foot square. These restrain and damage enemies in its area.
title: Evard's Black Tentacles

value: Spell that can double the caster's dash distance.
title: Expeditious Retreat

value: Spell that causes the target to sleep, panic, or feel sick. The caster can continue to target other creatures until the spell ends.
title: Eyebite

value: Spell that can transform raw materials into a product such as ladders, ropes, clothes so long as they are not complicated.
title: Fabricate

value: Spell that creates a magical outline around any creatures in its area. They give off a dim light and cannot benefit from invisibility.
title: Faerie Fire

value: Adds temporary health to the target.
title: False Life

value: Spell that causes targets in a thirty foot cone to become frightened. They dash away at the sight of you.
title: Fear

value: Reactionary spell that prevents a target from taking fall damage. They lightly fall to the ground.
title: Feather Fall

value: Spell that causes a willing target to appear dead to others for up to an hour. They have resistance to all damage.
title: Feign Death

value: Spell that spawns a spirit animal that you have a telepathic connection to. It cannot attack, but can do other actions. Only one familiar at a time.
title: Find Familiar

value: Spawns a large, rideable spirit animal that can attack, heal others, teleport, frighten enemies, and move quickly.
title: Find Steed

value: Spell that magically finds the direct route to a location of the caster's choosing.
title: Find the Path

value: Spell that detects the presence of traps within the line of sight. It reveals that a trap is present, but not where it is.
title: Find Traps

value: Spell that causes massive damage to a target that the caster can touch. If the touch kills, that target becomes a zombie.
title: Finger of Death

value: Spell that creates a bright streak which explodes on collision with a target. It causes fire damage in a twenty foot radius.
title: Fireball

value: Spell that summons a mote of fire and casts it at a creature within range. It causes a moderate amount of fire damage.
title: Fire Bolt

value: Spell that causes magical flames to protect the caster's body protecting from either cold or fire damage.
title: Fire Shield

value: Spell that summons a fire storm that causes fire damage to creatures in an area of 100 feet.
title: Fire Storm

value: Spell that creates a fire blade in the caster's hand. It allows melee attacks that cause fire damage.
title: Flame Blade

value: Spell that summons a column of fire roaring down from above which causes radiant and fire damage.
title: Flame Strike

value: Spell that summons a sphere that causes fire damage to any creatures next to it. The sphere can be commanded to move by the caster.
title: Flaming Sphere

value: Spell that causes a target to turn to stone if they fail to will themselves away from its effects.
title: Flesh to Stone

value: Spell that allows the target to fly for a period of time.
title: Fly

value: Spell that creates a twentyh foot sphere of fog which obstructs view through it.
title: Fog Cloud

value: Spell that prevents the magical use of telportation or portals within 40,000 square feet. It also damage aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and the undead.
title: Forbiddance

value: Spell that creates an invisible cube as a prison around a target.
title: Forcecage

value: Spell that gives the target the ability to see into the immediate future, giving an advantage to attacks and defense.
title: Foresight

value: Spell that causes the caster to emit bright light which causes attacks to have extra radiant damage. The caster is also resistant to radiant damage.
title: Fount of Moonlight

value: Spell that causes the target to be able to deftly move over difficult terrain.
title: Freedom of Movement

value: Spell that causes the target to be charmed. They are more likely to agree with the caster's requests, however they will know that they were charmed after the spell completes.
title: Friends

value: Spell that transforms the caster or a willing target into a gaseous form that can fly and has resistance to physical damage.
title: Gaseous Form

value: Spell that creates a portal that links a position the caster can see to another plane of existence. It can be used to summon a specific creature if its name is known.
title: Gate

value: Spell that charms a target and asks them to follow a verbal command.
title: Geas

value: Spell that prevents a corpse from becoming undead and makes it not decay.
title: Gentle Repose

value: Spell that summons a giant centipede, spider, or wasp that follows your commands.
title: Giant Insect

value: Spell that makes it appear that you are telling the truth even when magical means are used to detect lies.
title: Glibness

value: Spell that creates an impenetrable shell that prevents spells from affecting any targets inside it.
title: Globe of Invulnerability

value: Spell that allows you to inscribe a glyph that explodes or casts a spell based on a trigger specified by the caster.
title: Glyph of Warding

value: Spell that creates berries that provide enough nourishment for the entire day.
title: Goodberry

value: Spell that creates a magical vine that can do melee attacks and grapple enemies
title: Grasping Vine

value: Spell that covers the ground with a nonflammable grease that can cause creatures to fall over prone.
title: Grease

value: Spell that allows a target that can be touched to become invisible. This invisibility is not disenchanted when the target takes actions.
title: Greater Invisibility

value: Spell that removes exhaustion, curses, reduction to health or ability, charmed and petrified conditions.
title: Greater Restoration

value: Spell that summons a large, spectral guardian that hovers in a space. Any enemies that move within this space are attacked with radiant damage.
title: Guardian of Faith

value: Spell that that fills corridors with fog, doors with with arcane locks, stairs filled with spider webs, and another magical affect including gust, stinking cloud, dancing lights, suggestion, or magic mouth.
title: Guards and Wards

value: Spell that adds a higher probability of success to any ability check.
title: Guidance

value: Spell that casts a bolt of light at a creature that causes radiant damage. The next attack against this creature has advantage.
title: Guiding Bolt

value: Spell that creates a continuous line of strong wind that can push creatures.
title: Gust of Wind

value: Spell that is triggered after hitting an enemy with a ranged attack. Targets within 5 feet take piercing damage from a rain of thorns.
title: Hail of Thorns

value: Spell that prevents a choice of aberration, celestial, elemental, fey, fiend, or undead from entering the space. It can also create courage, darkness, daylight, peaceful rest, extradimensional interference, fear, resistance, silence, tongues, or vulnerability.
title: Hallow

value: Spell that makes terrain look like other terrain such as swamps, hills, crevasses, and difficult/impassible terrain.
title: Hallucinatory Terrain

value: Spell that causes necrotic damage on a target that can be seen.
title: Harm

value: Spell that causes a willing target to gain additional defense, become more dextrous, and gains an additional action every turn. When it is dispelled, the target becomes lethargic and must take a turn to recover.
title: Haste

value: Spell that heals the target by a significant amount. They are also cured of blinded, deafened, and poisoned conditions.
title: Heal

keys: Healing Word spell, cast Healing Word
value: Spell that heals a creature within visible range.
title: Healing Word

value: Spell that causes a metal object to heat up and cause fire damage to the creature utilizing it.
title: Heat Metal

value: Spell that is cast as a reaction to taking damage. The target takes fire damage from green flames.
title: Hellish Rebuke

value: Spell that magically conjures a feast that allows anyone who eats from it to have resistance to poison damage and cannot be frightened or poisoned.
title: Heroes' Feast

value: Spell that causes the target to not be frightened. It also adds temporary health.
title: Heroism

value: Spell that causes necrotic damage whenever the target is hit by an attack. It also has a disadvantage in a specified ability.
title: Hex

value: Spell that can paralyze a monster for a duration.
title: Hold Monster

value: Spell that can paralyze a person for a duration.
title: Hold Person

value: Spell that creates an emanation where allies within it gain advantage. Any fiends or undead that attack may become blinded.
title: Holy Aura

value: Spell that creates an opening to another realm that is infested with unspeakable horrors. This darkness inflicts cold damage to anyone within in it and causes them to be blind.
title: Hunger of Hadar

value: Spell that magically marks a creature. This causes extra force damage to the enemy when it is attacked by the caster and makes it easier to locate this creature.
title: Hunter's Mark

value: Spell that creates a pattern of colors that charms and incapacitates creatures that can see it.
title: Hypnotic Pattern

value: Spell that creates a shard of ice that is flinged at a target. The target takes piercing damage. The shard explodes and causes additional damage.
title: Ice Knife

value: Spell that creates hail which causes bludgeoning damage to enemies.
title: Ice Storm

value: Spell that determines the nature of a magical object. It can also determine what spells are affecting a target.
title: Identify

value: Spell that makes the caster's writing on any sort of writing material to appear non-sensical to others except whoever the caster has designated.
title: Illusory Script

value: Spell that creates magical restraints that hold a a target. The target can be buried, chained, or held in a demiplane/gemstone. It can also be put into a magical slumber.
title: Imprisonment

value: Spell that creates a swirling cloud of embers and smoke. It cannot be seen through and causes fire damage to creatures inside its space.
title: Incendiary Cloud

value: Spell that causes minor necrotic damage.
title: Inflict Wounds

value: Spell that creates a swarm of locusts that causes piercing damage to creatures that are in range.
title: Insect Plague

value: Spell that causes a willing target to become invisible. The spell ends if the target attacks or casts a spell.
title: Invisibility

value: Spell that creates a storm of thunder and flashing light. Creatures in this area are blinded and deafened and can't speak. They take radiant damage.
title: Jallarzi's Storm of Radiance

value: Spell that causes a willing target to be able to jump up to thirty feet.
title: Jump

value: Spell that unlocks any mundane or magical locks.
title: Knock

value: Spell that allows the caster to describe or name a popular person, place, or object. The caster then learns sinificant lore about that thing.
title: Legend Lore

value: Spell that allows the caster to hide a chest in the ethereal plane. It can be recalled by touching the tiny replica of the chest.
title: Leomund's Secret Chest

value: Spell that bars any creatures outside of its emanation from entering. Inside is dry and comfortable and can't be seen through from the outside.
title: Leomund's Tiny Hut

value: Spell that ends blinded, deafened, paralyzed, or poisoned conditions.
title: Lesser Restoration

value: Spell that causes the target to rise up twenty feet and stay there. The caster can then make the target rise up by twenty feet each turn.
title: Levitate

value: Spell that causes an object to emit bright light in a twenty foot radius
title: Light

value: Spell that transforms the ammunition of a ranged attack that just happened into a lightning bolt. It causes lightning damage.
title: Lightning Arrow

value: Spell that blasts a line of lightning damage from the caster.
title: Lightning Bolt

value: Spell that allows the caster to describe a beast or plant. The caster then learns the direction and distance to the closest creature or plant of that kind.
title: Locate Animals or Plants

value: Spell that allows the caster to describe or name a creature. The caster then learns the location of the target or the closest creature that matches that description.
title: Locate Creature

value: Spell that allows the caster to describe an object. The caster will sense the location of an object of that description if it's within one thousand feet.
title: Locate Object

value: Spell that increases the speed of a target that is touched.
title: Longstrider

value: Spell that increases the defense of the touched target. This is only applicable if they are not already wearing armor.
title: Mage Armor

value: Spell that creates an ethereal hand within range that will obey the commands of its caster. It must remain within range or it will disappear.
title: Mage Hand

value: Spell that creates a cylinder of magical energy. It may either block entry of creatures, the creatures inside are more susceptible to damage, or the creatures within cannot be frightened, charmed, or possessed.
title: Magic Circle

value: Spell that sends the caster's soul into a a container, leaving the caster's body in a catatonic state. The caster can then attempt to posess a humanoid body within 100 feet or return to their body.
title: Magic Jar

value: Spell that summons a number of darts comprised of pure magical force that can each target a creature that the caster can see within range, striking all at once.
title: Magic Missile

value: Spell that implants a message into an object. When triggered, the mouth will speak the message.
title: Magic Mouth

value: Spell that enchants a nonmagical weapon into becoming magical. It has a bonus to accuracy and damage.
title: Magic Weapon

value: Illusion spell that creates an image of an object, creature, or some visible phenomenon. It can be moved and appear naturally. Physical interaction will reveal that it is an illusion.
title: Major Image

value: Spell that sends a wave of healing energy over six creatures.
title: Mass Cure Wounds

value: Spell that sends a massive flood of healing energy into everyone around you.
title: Mass Heal

value: Spell that heals up to six creatures, including the caster, within a given range.
title: Mass Healing Word

value: Spell that causes up to twelve creatures to follow your command in 25 words or less.
title: Mass Suggestion

value: Spell that sends a creature into a demiplane that consists of a maze. They are forced to figure out how to escape it.
title: Maze

value: Spell that allows the caster to meld into stone, making the caster undectable.
title: Meld into Stone

value: Spell that spawns an arrow made of acid that is launched at a target.
title: Melf's Acid Arrow

value: Spell that repairs a simple break or tear in an item.
title: Mending

value: Spell that magically sends a whispered message to a target. The target can respond.
title: Message

value: Spell that sends explosive orbs down that cause fire and bludgeoning damage.
title: Meteor Swarm

value: Spell that grants the target immunity to psychic damage and cannot be charmed.
title: Mind Blank

value: Spell that causes psychic damage to the target and makes them more susceptible to failing anything that tests their abilities.
title: Mind Sliver

value: Spell that sends a spike of psionic energy into a target, causing psychic damage. The target can then not be hidden from the caster.
title: Mind Spike

value: Spell that creates an illusion of a sound or image of an object within range. The spell is broken if a physical interaction with the item reveals it to be a hoax.
title: Minor Illusion

value: Illusion spell that can change the environment/buildings to seem like some other kind of terrain or look. It will look, smell, and feel as if it was like the real thing.
title: Mirage Arcane

value: Spell that creates three duplicates of the caster. These make it hard for an enemy to target the caster, each taking damage for the caster.
title: Mirror Image

value: Spell that causes the caster to be invisible while a duplicate illusionary stand in appears in your place. It can move and behave as if it was you for the duration of the spell.
title: Mislead

value: Spell that allows the caster to teleport up to thirty feet away.
title: Misty Step

value: Spell that can charm a target. The target is incapacitated and a memory it has can be modified.
title: Modify Memory

value: Spell that shines a silvery beam of pale light in a cylinder at a specified point. It causes radiant damage.
title: Moonbeam

value: Spell that creates a watchdog that only the caster can see. It can bark and attack if a creature approaches without speaking a specified password.
title: Mordenkainen's Faithful Hound

value: Spell that creates a magical door that allows the caster and whoever they specify to enter an extradimensional mansion of any design. There are near transparent servants that do your bidding.
title: Mordenkainen's Magnificent Mansion

value: Spell that creates a space that sound can't pass through, appears dark and foggy, divination can't work inside of it, or teleporting doesn't work.
title: Mordenkainen's Private Sanctum

value: Spell that creates a hovering, spectral sword that can cause force damage on enemies that it attacks.
title: Mordenkainen's Sword

value: Spell that can reshape terrain. It can form pillars and shapes. Change elevation. The ground moves slowly enough that it can't be used to damage anyone.
title: Move Earth

value: Spell that hides the target from divination spells.
title: Nondetection

value: Spell that makes the target or an object react to spells and other magical effects as if it was of another type. It can make an object appear magical or nonmagical.
title: Nystul's Magic Aura

value: Spell that creates a frigid globe that explodes with cold damage.
title: Otiluke's Freezing Sphere

value: Spell that creates a shimmering sphere. Nothing can pass through or damage the sphere. Anything inside is imprisoned, but can roll the sphere to move.
title: Otiluke's Resilient Sphere

value: Spell that causes the target to dance comically for a short time.
title: Otto's Irresistible Dance

value: Spell that creates an opening on any specified wall, ceiling, or floor.
title: Passwall

value: Spell that creates an emanation around the caster that causes their allies to be more undetectable.
title: Pass without Trace

value: Spell that creates an illusion in the mind of a target. The illusion seems real and the target can even take psychic damage from it.
title: Phantasmal Force

value: Spell that draws from the nightmares of a creature and causes psychic damage over a period of time.
title: Phantasmal Killer

value: Spell that creates a large horselike creature. It has a saddle and can be ridden.
title: Phantom Steed

value: Spell that summons an otherworldly entity for aid. If it agrees, a celestial, elemental, or fiend ally is sent to aid the caster.
title: Planar Ally

value: Spell that attempts to bind a celestial, elemental, fey, or fiend into your service. The spell takes time and the target must be bound.
title: Planar Binding

value: Spell that allows the caster and allies to teleport to a different plane of existence.
title: Plane Shift

value: Spell that causes plants to grow. The plants can be overgrown and become difficult to pass through. The plants in the local area yield twice the amount of food.
title: Plant Growth

value: Spell that sprays a toxic mist that causes poison damage.
title: Poison Spray

value: Spell that transforms a target into a beast of some kind. Upon death, the target turns back to their original form.
title: Polymorph

value: Spell that adds temporary health to specified targets.
title: Power Word Fortify

value: Spell that causes a wave of healing energy to wash over a given target. It clears any negative conditions it faces.
title: Power Word Heal

value: Spell that causes intense psychic damage and may even kill outright if the target is weak.
title: Power Word Kill

value: Spell that causes the target to be stunned.
title: Power Word Stun

value: Spell that must take time to cast. Any targets within range are well rested and regain health points.
title: Prayer of Healing

value: Spell that creates a sensory effect, ignite/snuff a fire, cleans/soils, chill/warm/flavor nonliving material, mark, or create an illusionary trinket.
title: Prestidigitation

value: Spell that creates an array of colored lights in a cone. Targets hit by the light accept a random effect including fire/acid/lightning/poison/cold damage, restraint, and blinding.
title: Prismatic Spray

value: Spell that creates a shimmering, impassible plane of light forms. It is comprised of seven layers, red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet. Each layer has different magical properties must take a different type of damage to be destroyed.
title: Prismatic Wall

value: Spell that creates a flickering flame in the caster's hand. It emits dim light. It can be hurled to cause fire damage.
title: Produce Flame

value: Spell that creates an illusion that activates if a trigger is activated. It performs a preprogrammed performance.
title: Programmed Illusion

value: Spell that creates an intangible, illusory image of the caster. It moves, speaks, and behaves exactly in the way that the caster desires.
title: Project Image

value: Spell that causes the target to have resistance against a specified type of damage.
title: Protection from Energy

value: Spell that protects the target from aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and the undead. The target cannot be possessed, charmed, or frightened.
title: Protection from Evil and Good

value: Spell that prevents the target from being poisoned.
title: Protection from Poison

value: Spell that removes poison from nonmagical food and drink.
title: Purify Food and Drink

value: Spell that revives a dead creature if it wasn't undead. It doesn't restore missing body parts. The target is not well until it has time to rest.
title: Raise Dead

value: Spell that creates a telepathic bond with up to eight creatures. They can communicate through telepathy no matter what language they speak over any distance.
title: Rary's Telepathic Bond

value: Spell that casts a beam of energy. Targets affected by the beam will be at a disadvantage when they try to attack and inflict less damage.
title: Ray of Enfeeblement

value: Spell that casts a beam of blue-white light that causes cold damage on a given target within range. The target is then slowed for a short period of time.
title: Ray of Frost

value: Spell that casts a greenish ray that inflicts poison damage.
title: Ray of Sickness

value: Spell that decreases the size of the target making them easier to move and decreases their damage.
title: Reduce

value: Spell that heals a target and regrows any severed limbs.
title: Regenerate

value: Spell that can form a new body for a recently deceased humanoid (within 10 days). The new body is one of the following random species: aasimar, dragonborn, dwarf, elf, gnome, goliath, halfling, human, orc, or tiefling.
title: Reincarnate

value: Spell that removes all curses from a target.
title: Remove Curse

value: Spell that causes the target to receive less damage from a specific type of damage.
title: Resistance

value: Spell that revives a dead creature. It cannot be an undead when it died. The target is not well until it has a long rest.
title: Resurrection

value: Spell that reverses gravity within a fifty foot radius.
title: Reverse Gravity

value: Spell that can revive a creature that has died in the last minute. It does not restore missing body parts.
title: Revivify

value: Spell that levitates an end of a rope. The rope leads to a portal that opens into extradimensional space. Creatures can climb into this space and become immune to spells and attacks.
title: Rope Trick

value: Spell that creates a flame-like radiance around a creature that the caster can see. The target takes radiant damage.
title: Sacred Flame

value: Spell that wards a creature within range. Any attacks or spells targeted against this creature can be redirected at another opponent or be nullified completely.
title: Sanctuary

value: Spell that shoots three friery rays at targets that cause fire damage.
title: Scorching Ray

value: Spell that allows the caster to see and hear any target on the same plane of existence. The effectiveness of the spell depends on how well the caster knows the target and if they have any personal affects of the target.
title: Scrying

value: Spell that causes the caster's attack to have additional fire damage.
title: Searing Smite

value: Spell that allows the caster to see invisible creatures and see into the ethereal plane.
title: See Invisibility

value: Spell that changes the appearance of a number of creatures with illusion. The appearance must have the same basic arrangement of limbs, but can look like anything.
title: Seeming

value: Spell that sends a short message telepathically to a creature that the caster has met before.
title: Sending

value: Spell that causes the target or an object to become invisible and can't be targeted by divination, detected by magic, or viewed remotely. The target is made unconcious and doesn't age or need food. This lasts until a trigger is called.
title: Sequester

value: Spell that allows the caster to shapeshift into another creature. The caster keeps their mind and the ability to talk.
title: Shapechange

value: Spell that creates a loud noise in a sphere. Creatures inside the sphere take thunder damage.
title: Shatter

value: Spell that creates an invisible barrier that protects the user from some physical damage.
title: Shield

value: Spell that creates a shimmering field which gives the target increased defense.
title: Shield of Faith

value: Spell that allows the caster to use their magic ability instead of strength to attack with a weapon.
title: Shillelagh

value: Spell that allows the caster to attack and add radiant damage to the blow.
title: Shining Smite

value: Spell that causes lightning damage from the touch of the caster.
title: Shocking Grasp

value: Spell that creates a spherical space where no words can be spoken and no sounds can be heard. This prevents magic that requires speech.
title: Silence

value: Spell that creates an illusionary image. It can be moved, but it is not accompanied by an appropriate smell or sound.
title: Silent Image

value: Spell that makes a copy of a creature out of ice or snow. It then follows the caster's commands and is functionally like the original. The spell consumes an expensive ruby.
title: Simulacrum

value: Spell that causes the target to become unconcious. The condition ends if the target is damaged or awoken by another creature.
title: Sleep

value: Spell that conjures sleet in the area of a cylinder. The terrain becomes difficult to navigate and creatures are knocked prone.
title: Sleet Storm

value: Spell that causes targets to move slower, resulting in targets being able to do less actions and be susceptible to attacks.
title: Slow

value: Spell that shoots energy at a creature. It takes damage of a type that the caster chooses. There is a chance that additional damage is added.
title: Sorcerous Burst

value: Spell that stabilizes a creature that is on death's door.
title: Spare the Dying

value: Spell that allows the caster to communicate fully with beasts.
title: Speak with Animals

value: Spell that allows the caster to ask up to five questions to a corpse which will animate and respond according to what it knew in life.
title: Speak with Dead

value: Spell that allows the caster to ask simple questions to plants in a thirty foot range. The plants can also follow commands and even make impassible thicket easier to walk through.
title: Speak with Plants

value: Spell that allows a willing target to be able to move accross walls and ceilings without using their hands.
title: Spider Climb

value: Spell that sprouts spiky grow in a twenty foot range that is hard to traverse and causes piercing damage.
title: Spike Growth

value: Spell that conjures good or evil spirits that slows and causes radiant or necrotic damage to any creatures that enter a fifteen foot range.
title: Spirit Guardians

value: Spell that creates a floating, spectral weapon that obeys the caster's commands. It can move independently and attack opponents. It can take the shape of any form of any melee weapon.
title: Spiritual Weapon

value: Spell that adds additional psychic damage to an attack. It has a chance to stun an opponent.
title: Staggering Smite

value: Spell that launches a mote of light at a creature. It takes radiant damage and emits dim light.
title: Starry Wisp

value: Spell that makes the caster vanish and then strike like the wind against up to five opponents. They each take force damage. Then the caster is teleported next to one of the opponents.
title: Steel Wind Strike

value: Spell that creates a nauseating gas around a point. It causes creatures to be poisoned and not be able to take action for a short time.
title: Stinking Cloud

value: Spell that can transform stone into any shape including weapons, passage ways, doors, or simple locks.
title: Stone Shape

value: Spell that transforms the target's skin so that it has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
title: Stoneskin

value: Spell that creates a storm that causes thunder damage against creatures in its area. It progresses to rain acid, strike lightning, cast hailstones, and eventually blow freezing wind.
title: Storm of Vengeance

value: A trading card game passed down through the generations. The magical cards are rare and have incredible value. Players use the cards to have friendly battles.
title: Stragedy Card Game

value: Sends all cards that have the number that this card is played on to the discard pile.
title: Stragedy Ace Card

value: Sends the targeted card back to the discard pile. The player can then draw a card from the discard pile and take another turn.
title: Stragedy Jack Card

value: Your opponent must discard 5 cards from their draw pile.
title: Stragedy Brigand Card

value: Increases the total of the numbered card that this is placed on to get a score of 30. It cannot subtract points if you bust, however.
title: Stragedy Joker Card

value: Doubles the value of the numbered card that this is played on both sides of the battlefield.
title: Stragedy King Card

value: Prevents the numbered card that this is played on from causing you to bust. It subtracts down to 30.
title: Stragedy Priest Card

value: Removes the value of the numbered card that this is played on and adds it to the opponent.
title: Stragedy Queen Card

value: Forces the opponent to play a card directly from their draw pile or a random one chosen from their hand. If it can't be played, they must discard their hand.
title: Stragedy Witch Card

value: Spell that allows the caster to suggest a course of action that a creature will follow. It has to be short and achieveable.
title: Suggestion

value: Spell that allows the caster to summon an abberation that must follow the caster's commands.
title: Summon Aberration

value: Spell that allows the caster to summon a beast that must follow the caster's commands.
title: Summon Beast

value: Spell that allows the caster to summon a celestial that must follow the caster's commands.
title: Summon Celestial

value: Spell that creates a construct that must follow the caster's commands.
title: Summon Construct

value: Spell that allows the caster to summon a draconic spirit that must follow the caster's commands.
title: Summon Dragon

value: Spell that allows the caster to summon an elemental spirit that must follow the caster's commands.
title: Summon Elemental

value: Spell that allows the caster to summon a fey spirit  that must follow the caster's commands.
title: Summon Fey

value: Spell that allows the caster to summon a fiend that must follow the caster's commands.
title: Summon Fiend

value: Spell that allows the caster to summon an undead spirit that must follow the caster's commands.
title: Summon Undead

value: Spell that creates a beam of sunlight that blinds enemies and causes radiant damage. It can be summoned again while this spell is in effect. The caster has a light mote of brilliance while this spell is active.
title: Sunbeam

value: Spell that creates a brilliant blast of sunlight in a 60 foot radius. It blinds enemies and causes significant radiant damage.
title: Sunburst

value: Spell that allows the caster to take additional attacks with a bow or crossbow.
title: Swift Quiver

value: Spell that creates a harmful glyph that can be set off by a specified trigger as a trap. It can cause necrotic damage, cause targets to argue with themselves, frighten/incapacitate/sleep/stun them.
title: Symbol

value: Spell that causes the creature to be charmed and must move as close as possible to the caster.
title: Sympathy

value: Spell that causes psychic damage. The target then has difficulty maintaining concentration.
title: Synaptic Static

value: Spell that creates a cauldron. The caster can then reach in to receive a common or uncommon potion.
title: Tasha's Bubbling Cauldron

value: Spell that causes the target to go prone and laugh uncontrollably.
title: Tasha's Hideous Laughter

value: Spell that allows the caster to move objects or creatures with their mind.
title: Telekinesis

value: Spell that allows the caster to speak telepathically with willing targets of their choosing, instantly sending images, words, sounds, and other sensory messages.
title: Telepathy

value: Spell that instantly transports the caster and up to eight other creatures at once. The target location must be known by the caster or it may result in a mishap of some kind.
title: Teleport

value: Spell that allows the caster to draw a circle on the ground. This circle is linked with a permanent circle created in another location.
title: Teleportation Circle

value: Spell that creates a simple floating disc that can move creatures or objects. It follows the caster.
title: Tenser's Floating Disk

value: Spell that causes the target to have altered eyes or a booming voice. It can also play with fire, open a door or window dramatically, create a sound, or cause harmless tremors.
title: Thaumaturgy

value: Spell that creates a vine-like whip that causes piercing damage.
title: Thorn Whip

value: Spell that creates a loud boom that causes thunder damage that damages each creature within 5 feet.
title: Thunderclap

value: Spell that adds lightning damage to your attack and amplifies the attack's effectiveness.
title: Thunderous Smite

value: Spell that creates a wave of force that thrusts everything within a short range in front of you away. This can push friend and foe alike, causing them to topple over.
title: Thunderwave

value: Spell that stops the flow of time for everyone except the caster. The caster can take any actions during this short period, however any actions that affect another creature end the time stop.
title: Time Stop

value: Spell that allows the caster to point at a creature which will then hear the chime of a bell. It will take necrotic damage and more so if it is already damage.
title: Toll the Dead

value: Spell that grants a creature that the caster can touch the ability to understand all spoken or signed languages. They can also be understood by any creatures that know a language.
title: Tongues

value: Spell that allows creatures to enter a large plant and allow them to exit another plant elsewhere. The caster must have seen or touched this place before.
title: Transport via Plants

value: Spell that allows the caster to enter a tree and exit a similar one within 500 feet.
title: Tree Stride

value: Spell that allows the caster to select a target which will be transformed into another kind of creature. It can also transform objects into creatures and creatures into objects.
title: True Polymorph

value: Spell that resurrects a creature that has been dead for no longer than 200 years. The spell fully heals, cures, and regrows missing limbs.
title: True Resurrection

value: Spell that gives the target true sight, which sees through illusion, darkness, and invisibility.
title: True Seeing

value: Spell that allows the caster to attack with a weapon, but their accuracy and damage is based on their magical ability.
title: True Strike

value: Spell that creates a wall of water that can up to 300 feet tall. It causes significant bludgeoning damage.
title: Tsunami

value: Spell that creates an invisible force that performs simple tasks. It cannot attack or do any heavy lifting.
title: Unseen Servant

value: Spell that causes necrotic damage. The caster regains half of the damage as health.
title: Vampiric Touch

value: Spell that insults the target with a barrage of abusive language and subtle enchantments. If it can hear you, it will receive psychic damage and will be at a disadvantage for the next attack.
title: Vicious Mockery

value: Spell that launches a ball of acid at an enemy, causing incredible acid damage.
title: Vitriolic Sphere

value: Spell that creates a wall of fire that damages any enemies moving through it from a single side.
title: Wall of Fire

value: Spell that creates an invisible wall of force that prevents creatures, projectiles, and spells from passing through it. It can only be destroyed by the disintegrate spell.
title: Wall of Force

value: Spell that creates a wall of ice that causes significant cold damage to enemies that touch it initially. It can be destroyed, but leaves behind frigid air that continues to damage enemies.
title: Wall of Ice

value: Spell that creates a wall of stone that can also be shaped to imprison creatures.
title: Wall of Stone

value: Spell that creates a wall of tangled brush. It causes piercing and slashing damage to creatures trying to pass through it. It is difficult to pass through.
title: Wall of Thorns

value: Spell that creates a mystical connection between the caster and another creature. The creature has additional defense and resistance to all damage.
title: Warding Bond

value: Spell that allows a number of creatures to be able to breath underwater for a time.
title: Water Breathing

value: Spell that allows a number of creatures to be able to walk over the surface of liquids harmlessly.
title: Water Walk

value: Spell that shoots a mass of webs at a point, causing the terrain to be difficult to pass through. Any creatures caught in the web are restrained.
title: Web

value: Spell that creates visions of terrible things in a target's mind. This affects targets within a 30 foot radius. They take extreme psychic damage and continues to take damage while they are frightened.
title: Weird

value: Spell that allows a number of creatures transform into a gaseous form and traverse great distances with ease.
title: Wind Walk

value: Spell that creates a vortex of wind in any shape that makes a continuous path. It causes bludgeoning damage to creatures and pushes light creatures and missiles away.
title: Wind Wall

value: Spell that grants a single wish to caster. This is typically in the form of another spell casted for free. However, it can be casted to do anything, but with a chance of weakening the caster or removing their ability to ever make another wish again.
title: Wish

value: Spell that creates a sustained arc of lightning between the caster and the target. It causes constant lightning damage, but requires the user to concentrate on the spell. The spell is broken when the caster is injured or loses concentration in any way.
title: Witch Bolt

value: Spell that creates a burning radiance that causes radiant damage.
title: Word of Radiance

value: Spell that transports a number of creatures and the caster to a location previously designated as a sanctuary.
title: Word of Recall

value: Spell that causes additional necrotic damage to an attack.
title: Wrathful Smite

value: Spell that causes psychic damage whenever a creature enters ten feet from the caster.
title: Yolande's Regal Presence

value: Spell that creates a range of fifteen feet that any creatures within cannot speak a deliberate lie.
title: Zone of Truth
